titleStmt.title: Commonwealth of Kentucky v. Boon Hicks et al., Indictment
CWG6786

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Governor's official correspondence file, petitions for pardons, remissions, and respites 1863-1867

body.p:
Marshall Circuit Court
The Commonwealth of Kentucky
Against
Boon Hicks, James Ivy, Richard Ivy and Joshua Gamblin and Asher Goff

The Grand jury of Marshall County in the name & by the authority of the Commonwealth of Kentucky accuse Boon Hicks, James Ivy, Richard Ivy, Joshua Gamblin & Asher Goff of the crime of Robbery committed as follows, (viz) The said Boon Hicks, James Ivy, Richard Ivy, Joshua Gamblin & Asher Goff on the 26th day of June 1865 in the county aforesaid feloniously took and carried away one rifled gun of the value of fourteen dollars two bridles of the value of fourteen dollars toand one pair of martingalas of the value one & 1/2 dollars the property of H M W H Raper from the possession and in the presence of the said W. H. Raper & against his will be putting him in fear of some immediate injury to his person, against the peace and dignity of the commonwealth of Kentucky.

W. W. Tice
Commonwealth's atty 1st J. D.

Information by
W. H. Raper
George Tucker
Malaki Cooper

A Copy: Attest
C. C. Coulter clk
Bail fixed at Five Hundred Dollars for each Deft.

Commonwealth of Ky
Against } Robbery
Boon Hicks, James Ivy, Richard Ivy, Joshua Gamblin & Asher Goff
No. 43
Filed in open Court & bench warrant issued ^to McCracken^ July 1 1865.
Test. J. H. Riley clk

A. True Bill
J. B. Dupriest
Foreman

A copy Attest:
C. C. Coulter clk
